metadata.feature_description: Manages directories that should be excluded from search crawling operations

steps.action: Navigate to Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling settings page displays with Excluded Directories section
steps.actual: Crawling tab displayed with Url Paths, Duplicates, Included Directories, and Excluded Directories sections

steps.expected: List of excluded directories is displayed with directory paths and delete icons
steps.actual: Excluded Directories section shows 'Badges/' with a delete icon

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add directory to excluded list using folder picker

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button in Excluded Directories section
steps.expected: Folder picker opens for directory selection
steps.actual: Folder picker form opened with dropdown showing 'Select a folder'

steps.action: Click the dropdown to expand folder tree
steps.expected: Folder tree expands showing available directories
steps.actual: Folder tree expanded showing Site Root with subfolders: Badges, EmptyTestFolder2026, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, etc.

steps.action: Select 'Images' folder from the folder tree
steps.actual: Images folder was selected and displayed in the folder picker

steps.action: Click Save button to add the directory
steps.expected: Images directory is added to the excluded list
steps.actual: Images directory was successfully added to the Excluded Directories list alongside Badges/

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add duplicate directory and verify error

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' and select 'Badges' folder (already in excluded list)
steps.expected: Badges folder is selected for adding
steps.actual: Badges folder was selected in the folder picker

steps.action: Click Save button to attempt adding duplicate directory
steps.expected: Error message indicating directory is already excluded
steps.actual: Error notification displayed: 'Directory duplicated. This directory Badges/ is already added'

steps.action: Locate delete icon next to 'Images' in Excluded Directories list
steps.expected: Delete icon is visible for Images directory
steps.actual: Delete icon (trash icon) visible next to Images directory
Confirmation dialog appeared: 'Are you sure you want to delete Images?' with No and Yes buttons

steps.expected: Images directory is removed from the excluded list
steps.actual: Images directory was removed. Excluded Directories list now shows only 'Badges/'

observations: The folder picker uses a dropdown tree component that requires clicking to expand folders
Duplicate directory validation works correctly and displays user-friendly error message
Delete confirmation dialog provides clear warning before permanent deletion
Directory paths are displayed with trailing slash (e.g., 'Badges/') for clarity
